### getExpectedExitLoopLatchBranch() {#a74712012450beeec949c228fd21d10a6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static BranchInst &#42; getExpectedExitLoopLatchBranch (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Checks if <code>L</code> has an exiting latch branch.

There may also be other exiting blocks. Returns branch instruction terminating the loop latch if above check is successful, nullptr otherwise.

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Set input string into loop metadata by keeping other values intact.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the string is already in loop metadata update value if it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// different.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a55c9054d63d1c6a39e9c09ba13a482fa"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a55c9054d63d1c6a39e9c09ba13a482fa">llvm::addStringMetadataToLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;TheLoop, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;StringMD,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the loop already has metadata, retain it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;LoopID = TheLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop/#afbcd78588d5235f99698b5c30f591382">getLoopID</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 1, ie = LoopID-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#aa4068e37ec583962685e3567dc102ae5">getNumOperands</a>(); i &lt; ie; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;MDNode&gt;</a>(LoopID-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#a42409838a49255a3770da1469872f20b">getOperand</a>(i));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we know the removal is safe, remove the loop by changing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch from the preheader to go to the single exit block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because we&#39;re deleting a large chunk of code at once, the sequence in which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we remove things is very important to avoid invalidation issues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tell ScalarEvolution that the loop is deleted. Do this before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deleting the loop so that ScalarEvolution can look at the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to determine what it needs to clean up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a592bdd7731b14ff4ff5d646f6f399900">forgetLoop</a>(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a830ba09d5969cd66878b05c17fdf66b6">forgetBlockAndLoopDispositions</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;OldTerm = Preheader-&gt;getTerminator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!OldTerm-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a6ea260be710ac7b61309534308da3147">mayHaveSideEffects</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Preheader must end with a side-effect-free terminator&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OldTerm-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a3287172f2d13af086e6d66364e8c6de3">getNumSuccessors</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Preheader must have a single successor&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Connect the preheader to the exit block. Keep the old edge to the header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// around to perform the dominator tree update in two separate steps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -- #1 insertion of the edge preheader -&gt; exit and #2 deletion of the edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preheader -&gt; header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0  Preheader          1  Preheader           2  Preheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        |                    |   |                   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        V                    |   V                   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      Header &lt;--\\            | Header &lt;--\\           | Header &lt;--\\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //       |  |     |            |  |  |     |           |  |  |     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       |  V     |            |  |  V     |           |  |  V     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       | Body --/            |  | Body --/           |  | Body --/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       V                     V  V                    V  V</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      Exit                   Exit                    Exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By doing this is two separate steps we can perform the dominator tree</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// update without using the batch update API.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Even when the loop is never executed, we cannot remove the edge from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// source block to the exit block. Consider the case where the unexecuted loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches back to an outer loop. If we deleted the loop and removed the edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coming to this inner loop, this will break the outer loop structure (by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deleting the backedge of the outer loop). If the outer loop is indeed a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-loop, it will be deleted in a future iteration of loop deletion pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(OldTerm);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After the loop has been deleted all the values defined and modified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inside the loop are going to be unavailable. Values computed in the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be be replaced with undef. Loop invariant values will still be available.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((LatchBR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0) == L-&gt;getHeader() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return the estimated trip count for any exiting branch which dominates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the loop latch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823" lineLink="#a0d49831d7116d82b2d53c2bbb81cd12d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="#a0d49831d7116d82b2d53c2bbb81cd12d">getEstimatedTripCount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;ExitingBranch,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                     uint64&#95;t &amp;OrigExitWeight) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To estimate the number of times the loop body was executed, we want to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// know the number of times the backedge was taken, vs. the number of times</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we exited the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t LoopWeight, ExitWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(&#42;ExitingBranch, LoopWeight, ExitWeight))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L-&gt;contains(ExitingBranch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(1)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(LoopWeight, ExitWeight);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ExitWeight)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t have a way to return predicated infinite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OrigExitWeight = ExitWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Estimated exit count is a ratio of the loop weight by the weight of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// edge exiting the loop, rounded to nearest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ExitCount = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5c8c0b408c713614c36293a08c0a5203">llvm::divideNearest</a>(LoopWeight, ExitWeight);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Estimated trip count is one plus estimated exit count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExitCount + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b3c6dc8e7df65d2385acfe9657abd03"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b3c6dc8e7df65d2385acfe9657abd03">llvm::getLoopEstimatedTripCount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;EstimatedLoopInvocationWeight) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently we take the estimate exit count only from the loop latch,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ignoring other exiting blocks.  This can overestimate the trip count</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we exit through another exit, but can never underestimate it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: incorporate information from other exits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;LatchBranch = <a href="#a74712012450beeec949c228fd21d10a6">getExpectedExitLoopLatchBranch</a>(L)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t ExitWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; EstTripCount =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="#a0d49831d7116d82b2d53c2bbb81cd12d">getEstimatedTripCount</a>(LatchBranch, L, ExitWeight)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EstimatedLoopInvocationWeight)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;EstimatedLoopInvocationWeight = ExitWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;EstTripCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad7cd933f586fc0c66656a4751ac069f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad7cd933f586fc0c66656a4751ac069f">llvm::setLoopEstimatedTripCount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EstimatedTripCount,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EstimatedloopInvocationWeight) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At the moment, we currently support changing the estimate trip count of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the latch branch only.  We could extend this API to manipulate estimated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// trip counts for any exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;LatchBranch = <a href="#a74712012450beeec949c228fd21d10a6">getExpectedExitLoopLatchBranch</a>(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LatchBranch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate taken and exit weights.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LatchExitWeight = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BackedgeTakenWeight = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EstimatedTripCount &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LatchExitWeight = EstimatedloopInvocationWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BackedgeTakenWeight = (EstimatedTripCount - 1) &#42; LatchExitWeight;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a0692c75c1b45226b6afb90ad609eb86a">TargetTransformInfo::ReductionShuffle</a> RS,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VF is a power of 2 so we can emit the reduction using log2(VF) shuffles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and vector ops, reducing the set of values being computed by half each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// round.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(VF) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Reduction emission only supported for pow2 vectors!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: fast-math-flags flags are controlled by the builder configuration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and are assumed to apply to all generated arithmetic instructions.  Other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// poison generating flags (nsw/nuw/inbounds/inrange/exact) are not part</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the builder configuration, and since they&#39;re not passed explicitly,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will never be relevant here.  Note that it would be generally unsound to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagate these from an intrinsic call to the expansion anyways as we/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// change the order of operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BuildShuffledOp = &#91;&amp;Builder, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          &amp;RdxKind&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;ShuffleMask,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;TmpVec) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a0692c75c1b45226b6afb90ad609eb86aa327036a1ef7ccbd87697bb2a2197d9ae">TargetTransformInfo::ReductionShuffle::Pairwise</a> == RS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 32&gt;</a> ShuffleMask(VF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> stride = 1; stride &lt; VF; stride &lt;&lt;= 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialise the mask with undef.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::fill(ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>(), ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(), -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 0; j &lt; VF; j += stride &lt;&lt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ShuffleMask&#91;j&#93; = j + stride;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BuildShuffledOp(ShuffleMask, TmpVec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 32&gt;</a> ShuffleMask(VF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = VF; i != 1; i &gt;&gt;= 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move the upper half of the vector to the lower half.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 0; j != i / 2; ++j)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ShuffleMask&#91;j&#93; = i / 2 + j;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill the rest of the mask with undef.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::fill(&amp;ShuffleMask&#91;i / 2&#93;, ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(), -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BuildShuffledOp(ShuffleMask, TmpVec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The exit value can be replaced with the final value when it is cheap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to do so.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#a321d169dcb80429e5c3fdf455c4517ec">ReplaceExitValue</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad711012ae6f56de75424c48f31538986a0cba5d71f8085f5b0bd4c61555d86bb6">UnusedIndVarInLoop</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inductiondescriptor">InductionDescriptor</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;IndPhi = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IndPhi) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#aaa061922b1e4ea5e3dab5f468f004859">checkIsIndPhi</a>(IndPhi, L, SE, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is an induction PHI. Check that the only users are PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes, and induction variable update binary operators.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">llvm::any&#95;of</a>(Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a411cf3e3932f209ce3374cb31adc1da6">users</a>(), &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  if (!isa&lt;PHINode&gt;(U) &amp;&amp; !isa&lt;BinaryOperator&gt;(U))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    return true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  BinaryOperator &#42;B = dyn&#95;cast&lt;BinaryOperator&gt;(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  if (B &amp;&amp; B != ID.getInductionBinOp())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    return true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it is not an induction phi, it must be an induction update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// binary operator with an induction phi user.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BinaryOperator&gt;</a>(Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">llvm::any&#95;of</a>(Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a411cf3e3932f209ce3374cb31adc1da6">users</a>(), &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  PHINode &#42;Phi = dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  if (Phi != PN &amp;&amp; !checkIsIndPhi(Phi, L, SE, ID))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    return true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.getInductionBinOp())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, this instruction has a user outside of the current loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and varies predictably &#42;inside&#42; the loop.  Evaluate the value it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contains when the loop exits, if possible.  We prefer to start with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expressions which are true for all exits (so as to maximize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expression reuse by the SCEVExpander), but resort to per-exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// evaluation if that fails.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;ExitValue = SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a21d6ee82eed29080d911dbb548a8bb68">getSCEVAtScope</a>(Inst, L-&gt;getParentLoop());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVCouldNotCompute&gt;</a>(ExitValue) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlight">            !SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a5a19768af81df7e5fe571bc08dcd48b3">isLoopInvariant</a>(ExitValue, L) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><span class="doxyHighlight">            !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/virtregmap-cpp/#a1ad52109a2ff430460c8776286b97b2e">Rewriter</a>.isSafeToExpand(ExitValue)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: This should probably be sunk into SCEV in some way; maybe a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getSCEVForExit(SCEV&#42;, L, ExitingBB)?  It can be generalized for</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVCouldNotCompute&gt;</a>(ExitCount))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;AddRec = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVAddRecExpr&gt;</a>(SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a30bd18ac905eacf3601bc6a553a9ff49">getSCEV</a>(Inst)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddRec-&gt;getLoop() == L)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><span class="doxyHighlight">              ExitValue = AddRec-&gt;evaluateAtIteration(ExitCount, &#42;SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVCouldNotCompute&gt;</a>(ExitValue) ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">              !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/virtregmap-cpp/#a1ad52109a2ff430460c8776286b97b2e">Rewriter</a>.isSafeToExpand(ExitValue))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Computing the value outside of the loop brings no benefit if it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// definitely used inside the loop in a way which can not be optimized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// away. Avoid doing so unless we know we have a value which computes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the ExitValue already. TODO: This should be merged into SCEV</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#a321d169dcb80429e5c3fdf455c4517ec">ReplaceExitValue</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad711012ae6f56de75424c48f31538986add1840394cd7a4e7d080482f42e7b424">AlwaysRepl</a> &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(ExitValue) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if expansions of this SCEV would count as being high cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HighCost = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/virtregmap-cpp/#a1ad52109a2ff430460c8776286b97b2e">Rewriter</a>.isHighCostExpansion(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><span class="doxyHighlight">            ExitValue, L, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a837209d51e75f7afcfdf457b20e59493">SCEVCheapExpansionBudget</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>, Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that we must not perform expansions until after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we query &#42;all&#42; the costs, because if we perform temporary expansion</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inbetween, one that we might not intend to keep, said expansion</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42;may&#42; affect cost calculation of the next SCEV&#39;s we&#39;ll query,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and next SCEV may errneously get smaller cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Collect all the candidate PHINodes to be rewritten.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;InsertPt =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(Inst) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LandingPadInst&gt;</a>(Inst)) ?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &amp;&#42;Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()-&gt;getFirstInsertionPt() : Inst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RewritePhiSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(PN, i, ExitValue, InsertPt, HighCost);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1690"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1691"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1694"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: evaluate whether it is beneficial to change how we calculate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// high-cost: if we have SCEV &#39;A&#39; which we know we will expand, should we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculate the cost of other SCEV&#39;s after expanding SCEV &#39;A&#39;, thus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// potentially giving cost bonus to those other SCEV&#39;s?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopCanBeDel = <a href="#a4fc6667c0f14f4e871d21234a6726246">canLoopBeDeleted</a>(L, RewritePhiSet);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumReplaced = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/rewritephi">RewritePhi</a> &amp;Phi : RewritePhiSet) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;PN = Phi.PN;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only do the rewrite when the ExitValue can be expanded cheaply.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If LoopCanBeDel is true, rewrite exit value aggressively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#a321d169dcb80429e5c3fdf455c4517ec">ReplaceExitValue</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad711012ae6f56de75424c48f31538986a1e6c3ab87bc6c3b3ee4b5a64e3a99963">OnlyCheapRepl</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/indvarsimplify-cpp/#a321d169dcb80429e5c3fdf455c4517ec">ReplaceExitValue</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad711012ae6f56de75424c48f31538986a0cba5d71f8085f5b0bd4c61555d86bb6">UnusedIndVarInLoop</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">        !LoopCanBeDel &amp;&amp; Phi.HighCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ExitVal = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/virtregmap-cpp/#a1ad52109a2ff430460c8776286b97b2e">Rewriter</a>.expandCodeFor(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// IR Values for the lower and upper bounds of a pointer evolution.  We</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/pointerbounds">PointerBounds</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Expand code for the lower and upper bound of the pointer group \\p CG</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;PtrArithTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype/#a8d7f800be5fd53dcfcdcbdc6fd9ccfe3">PointerType::get</a>(Ctx, CG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/runtimecheckingptrgroup/#a09ba5cdd25cec4e4080aa882557b708d">AddressSpace</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;LAA: Adding RT check for range:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05609d049bfe3c5c2f64711566131a86a28d0edd045e05cf5af64e35ae0c4c6ef">Low</a> = CG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/runtimecheckingptrgroup/#afac0830f0932768a1e5059fa696f1be1">Low</a>, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a7df34dbf636f2fbbb00f2b86eccdb1eb">High</a> = CG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/runtimecheckingptrgroup/#a4c6c88b61312f50f0375ba8637590f5e">High</a>, &#42;Stride = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Low and High values are themselves loop-variant, then we may want</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to expand the range to include those covered by the outer loop as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is a trade-off here with the advantage being that creating checks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using the expanded range permits the runtime memory checks to be hoisted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out of the outer loop. This reduces the cost of entering the inner loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which can be significant for low trip counts. The disadvantage is that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is a chance we may now never enter the vectorized inner loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whereas using a restricted range check could have allowed us to enter at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// least once. This is why the behaviour is not currently the default and is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// controlled by the parameter &#39;HoistRuntimeChecks&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp/#a8b4f30b1176e1eebdd8b4998f66e97ef">HoistRuntimeChecks</a> &amp;&amp; TheLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;A|B&#93;.Start points to the first accessed byte under base &#91;A|B&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;A|B&#93;.End points to the last accessed byte, plus one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is no conflict when the intervals are disjoint:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NoConflict = (B.Start &gt;= A.End) || (A.Start &gt;= B.End)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bound0 = (B.Start &lt; A.End)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bound1 = (A.Start &lt; B.End)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  IsConflict = bound0 &amp; bound1</span></CodeLine>
